commit message: Merge branch 'master' into develop

Use context.getContext instead of getActivity and get rid of potential NPE.
Also fix few style issues.

Merge pull request #1480 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1435-drop-inner-fragments-stats

Drop calls to inner fragments management methods
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/WordPress-Android into issue/1336-reader-swipe-posts
Fixed bug that prevented latest comments/likes from appearing if stored counts hadn't changed
Remove v4.support.Fragment and use native fragments.

Merge pull request #1488 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1436-use-native-fragments

Remove v4.support.Fragment and use native fragments.

Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/WordPress-Android into issue/1336-reader-swipe-posts

Merge pull request #1489 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1473-disable-crashlytics-applog

fix #1473: disable crashlytics logging of all caught exceptions

Merge pull request #1483 from wordpress-mobile/feature/android-studio-0.6

Feature/android studio 0.6
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/WordPress-Android into issue/1336-reader-swipe-posts
No longer returning to the post list when back button is pressed while fullscreen video is showing.

Clear the notifications map when notifications are dismissed.

Uses a broadcast receiver that notifies when notifications are cleared/swiped away in the notifications area.

Fixes #1481
Use context already passed in `onMessage`

Merge pull request #1430 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1336-reader-swipe-posts

Issue/1336 reader swipe posts
add new entry in preferences: send usage statistics
send stats opt out option prevent all analytics tracker to track any event

Changed notifications map to be private and final.

Also fixed a few code style issues in `GCMIntentService` that I noticed.

Merge pull request #1495 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1481-push-dismiss

Clear the notifications map when notifications are dismissed.
Tag titles are no longer written to the app log
reword _send usage_ checkbox summary
start or end session after reloading optout option

- SSL certs host name verifier: Switch to BrowserCompatHostnameVerifier host name verifier that works the same way as Curl and Firefox.
- When a certificate fails the host name verification with the default implementation, check it against our SSLTRust store. The certificate could be added to the trusted certificates pool.

Merge pull request #1498 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1493-dont-show-tags-in-log

issue/1357-dont-show-tags-in-log
changed clearAllData() to not endSession, and add a force option to endSession

Merge pull request #1499 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1490-mixpanel-optout-option

fix #1490 mixpanel optout option

Merge pull request #1500 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1487-shared-ssl-cert-issue

Re-add support for Self hosted sites that share one SSL certificate
3.0-beta-1 version bump
